sourcesContent:
import React, {useState} from 'react' import { MDBBtn } from 'mdbreact'; import Navbar from '../components/Navbar'; import Sidebar from '../components/Sidebar'; import { Link as Link2 } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link } from 'react-scroll'; const Login = () => { const [isOpen, setIsOpen] = useState(false) const [value, setValue] = useState('Type your email'); const [value2, setValue2] = useState('Type your password'); const [isShow, setIsShow] = useState(false) const [isShow2, setIsShow2] = useState(false) const toggle = () => { setIsOpen(!isOpen); }; const handleChange1 = () => { setValue(''); setIsShow(true) } const handleChange2 = () => { setValue2(''); setIsShow2(true) } return ( <>
